quoteText:
These and other features may require our systems to access, store, and scan Your Stuff.
You give us permission to do those things, and this permission extends to our affiliates and trusted third parties we work with.
title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: "These and other features may require our systems to access, store and scan Your Stuff. You give us permission to do those things, and this permission extends to our affiliates and trusted third parties we work with."
